text:
Huawei FreeBuds 3 arrive in Italy with an interesting promotion (photo)
07 Nov 2019, 10:30 by Roberto Artigiani
On the occasion of the arrival in Italy of the new FreeBuds 3 wireless earphones, Huawei announces an exclusive promotion: those who purchase them by 2 December, at one of the participating stores, will receive a universal Huawei Wireless Charger (with a value of 59.99 â‚¬).
The offer is valid only if the purchase or pre-order is made in one of the shops shown on this page. To participate in the promo it is necessary to register on the page dedicated to the operation by December 15, registrations will be opened on November 15th.
Please note that in the case of a direct purchase, you will be asked to upload a proof (which will include the merchant's name, date and name of the item), the same applies to bookings which will then be followed by a proof of completion of the 'purchase. For all the details, for the FAQ and for more information, please visit the official page of the promotion.
